# bypass

**Instance Property**

The bypass state of the equalizer filter band.

## Declaration

```swift
var bypass: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the bypass is active; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Getting and Setting Equalizer Filter Parameters

- **bandwidth**: The bandwidth of the equalizer filter, in octaves.
- **filterType**: The equalizer filter type.
- **frequency**: The frequency of the equalizer filter, in hertz.
- **gain**: The gain of the equalizer filter, in decibels.
